question: here arab people are all maliki hence I always pray at their time. Is it ok since there is not any single hanafi mosque where I live?
answer:
QUESTION
I am a hanafi living in France and I go to the mosque to pray salat-ul-asr. But here arab people are all maliki hence I always pray at their time. Is it ok since there is not any single hanafi mosque where I live? Thanks in adsvance, May Allah bless you.
ANSWER


Share:

It is correct for you as a Hanafi to perform your Salaat with a Maaliki congregation according to the Maaliki Salaat times.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
